Body:
cosmo = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, sigma8=0.8, n_s=
    0.96, Neff=0, m_nu=0.0, w0=-1.0, wa=0.0, T_CMB=2.7, m_nu_type='normal',
    Omega_g=0, Omega_k=0, transfer_function='bbks', matter_power_spectrum=
    'linear')
data = np.loadtxt('./benchmarks/data/kNL.txt')
a = data[:, (0)]
kNL = data[:, (1)]
kNL_ccl = ccl.kNL(cosmo, a)
for i in range(len(a)):
    err = np.abs(kNL_ccl[i] / kNL[i] - 1)
    assert np.allclose(err, 0, rtol=0, atol=KNL_TOLERANCE)
